short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPTSearch: Add quick-search for chat history and GPTs within ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPTSearch is a free Chrome extension designed to streamline your search for past ChatGPT dialogues or specific GPTs using just a handful of keywords. Gone are the days of tediously scrolling through the chat history sidebar on the ChatGPT website to locate a previous conversation. Similarly, the hassle of navigating through multiple clicks and redirects to another page to find the right GPT is a thing of the past. With the ChatGPTSearch extension, you can effortlessly locate old chats or discover new GPTs all on one page ‚Äì say goodbye to endless scrolling and page jumping.

Key Features:
- Effortless Chat History Search: Simply type in keywords to instantly retrieve past conversations, saving you time and enhancing productivity.
- Explore GPTs with Ease: No need to open multiple tabs or navigate away from your current page. A quick keyword search brings a variety of GPTs to your fingertips, tailored to solve your specific problems.
- Conversations with specific GPTs: Simply type '@' followed by the name of a GPT, all associated conversations will be listed. Making it possible to view and navigate through your interactions with specific GPTs with unprecedented ease.
- Streamlined Workflow: These intuitive controls ensure that your workflow remains uninterrupted, offering a fluid and efficient search experience without ever needing to leave your current page.

How to Use?
Click the üîç icon located at the top-right corner of your page for quick access to ChatGPTSearch functionalities, or use keyboard shortcuts:
- Press ctrl+i to activate the chat history search;
- Press ctrl+; to explore GPTs aligned with your query;
- Type @ in the search input to list recently used GPTs.

ChatGPTSearch is your gateway to a more productive and efficient ChatGPT experience. Say goodbye to the hassle of scrolling and page-jumping. With ChatGPTSearch, your chat history and the world of GPTs are just a keyword away.
Save your time, enjoy the journey of ChatGPT!
